
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,len,l=0;
    //char str[100]={'\0'};
    string str;
    string::iterator it;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        if(l==0)
        cin.ignore();
        l=1;

        getline(cin,str);

        len=str.length();
        for(i=0;i<len;i++)
        {
            if((i==0||str[i-1]==' ') && str[i]=='8' && (str[i+1]==' '|| i==len-1))
            {cout<<"ate";
            if(i!=len-1)
            cout<<" ";
            i=i+1;}
            else if((i==0||str[i-1]==' ') && str[i]=='w' && str[i+1]=='8' && (str[i+2]==' '||i==len-2))
            {cout<<"wait";
            if(i!=len-2)
            cout<<" ";
            i=i+2;}
            else if((i==0||str[i-1]==' ') && str[i]=='g' && str[i+1]=='r' && str[i+2]=='8' && (str[i+3]==' '||i==len-3))
            {cout<<"great";
            if(i!=len-3)
            cout<<" ";
            i=i+3;}
            else if((i==0||str[i-1]==' ') && str[i]=='4' && (str[i+1]==' ' || i==len-1))
            {cout<<"for";
            if(i!=len-1)
            cout<<" ";
            i=i+1;}
            else if((i==0||str[i-1]==' ') && str[i]=='b' && str[i+1]=='4' && (str[i+2]==' '||i==len-2))
            {cout<<"before";
            if(i!=len-1)
            cout<<" ";
            i=i+2;}

            else
            cout<<str[i];
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
    return(0);
}
